balance as at 30 September 2022 CNY687K of utilities paid on behalf of Haining Wanpu
As indicated by management, the Target accrued 6.5% bad debt provision for utilities receivables aged within 1 year.

SUMMARY: Used entity 'Haining Wanpu' with amounts: CNY738K (utilities paid), CNY51K (provision), CNY687K (total)
